article.headline: UC Riverside 87, CS Bakersfield 47
article.story: RIVERSIDE, Calif. -- Kyle Austin had 19 points and eight rebounds to lead California Riverside in an 87-47 rout of Cal State Bakersfield Wednesday night. Larry Gurganious added 13 points and seven rebounds for the Highlanders (4-2). Trent Blakley had 19 points, five rebounds and two steals to lead the Roadrunners (1-4). Jose Lara was the team's leading rebounder with eight, and he also had two steals and a block. UC Riverside outrebounded the Roadrunners 47-37. CS Bakersfield made just 3 of 25 field goals (12 percent) and 4 of 9 free throws (44 percent) in the first half to trail 37-10 at halftime. The Roadrunners improved in the second half, shooting 32 percent from the field and scoring 37 points. UC Riverside hit 33 of 63 (52 percent) from the field in the game.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
